_header: Sometime I loved so do I yet
_description: The Delivered Lover — eight quatrains (aaab) and burden (cb): ‘Vp son and mery wether / Somer draweth nere’

CULFf16.First Lines:
Som tyme y louid so do y yutIn stedfast wyse and not to
                    flitBut in danger my loue was knytA pitous thyng to
                    hire…
CULFf16.Last Lines:
…That thay myght synge with mery hertThis song with […]
                    fere
